resources.string:
This is your agreement for using the SoundRec program. If you don't agree with it, don't install or, if it's too late, uninstall the software.
The program is free software and is open source. Everyone who has a device capable of running it is allowed to run it, to share it, without cost.
You agree that the providers of this software are not responsible for anything at all that happens while or because of running it, including software bugs, corruption of data, traffic accidents however caused, or any other incident however caused. Do not operate a vehicle while manipulating this program.
